short_summary: Real-Time PCR for relative detection and quantification of viral particles in samples
description: The St-Hyacinthe Research and Development Center (St-Hyacinthe RDC), Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC), wishes to acquire one (1) Real-Time PCR for relative detection and quantification of viral particles in samples.

full_summary:
======================
# Tender Information
=====================================

## Tender Title
---------------

**Title**: Purchase of one (1) Real-Time PCR
**Title (French)**: Achat d'un (1) PCR en temps réel

**Reference Number**: cb-910-37852054
**Amendment Number**: 4
**Solicitation Number**: 01B46-23-205
**Publication Date**: 2023-12-20

## Tender Details
-----------------

* **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-01-31T00:00:00
* **Amendment Date**: 2024-01-31
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2024-01-17
* **Expected Contract End Date**: 2024-03-29
* **Tender Status**: Expiré (Expired)

## Procurement Information
-------------------------

* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Selective tendering
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

## Delivery Region
------------------

* **Region of Delivery**: Quebec (except NCR)

## End User
------------

* **End User**: Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC)

## Terms and Conditions
------------------------

The St-Hyacinthe Research and Development Center (AAFC) requires a Real-Time PCR for the relative detection and quantification of viral particles in samples.

## How to Respond
------------------

* **Bid Submission Deadline**: 2024-01-31T00:00:00
* **Bid Documents**: Please refer to the attachment linked below for full tender information.
* **Attachment**: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/28033/npp-apm-23-205.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/28033/npp-apm-23-205.pdf)

## Contact Information
----------------------

* **Contact Name**: Marie-Pier Parent
* **Contact Email**: [marie-pier.parent@agr.gc.ca](mailto:marie-pier.parent@agr.gc.ca)
* **Contact Phone**: 15065317263
* **Contact Address**: 
  3600 Casavant West Boulevard, Saint-Hyacinthe, Quebec, H9S 1W6, Canada
